descriptions.Component: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Level 1, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.
descriptions.File_Size: Size of file (bucket object) in bytes
descriptions.HTAN_Center: Name of HTAN Center e.g. HTAN HTAPP
descriptions.Data_Release: Inclusion in HTAN Data Release e.g. Release 1.0
descriptions.CDS_Release: CDS transfer package in which file was included e.g. v22.6.1.seq
descriptions.Manifest_Id: Synapse ID of manifest containing file annotation
descriptions.Id: Unique identifier of entity e.g. a96059eb-81af-4b24-ae50-9242c0d8f819
